Text: My god this is gorgeous!  Not what you'd expect from Bird - much more simple (the musicians performed in a circle around a single mike in a barn; all acoustic instruments) and no fancy (well, purposely pretentious) lyric play.  Just great, great songs and far more country oriented than anything else he's done. Highlights: "Three White Horses" and "Spirograph."  I just listened to the album three times in a row.
